mapper.sql: ms_id, ms_name, ms_desp, ms_created, ms_modified, grp_id, ms_created_admin
mapper.insert: insert into pt_measurement (ms_name, ms_desp, ms_created, ms_modified, grp_id, ms_created_admin) values (#{msName}, #{msDesp}, #{msCreated}, #{msModified}, #{grpId}, #{msCreatedAdmin})

insert into pt_measurement
ms_name,
ms_desp,
ms_created,
ms_modified,
grp_id,
ms_created_admin,
#{msName},
#{msDesp},
#{msCreated},
#{msModified},
#{grpId},
#{msCreatedAdmin},
mapper.update:
update pt_measurement
ms_name = #{msName},
ms_desp = #{msDesp},
ms_created = #{msCreated},
ms_modified = #{msModified},
grp_id = #{grpId},
ms_created_admin = #{msCreatedAdmin},
where ms_id = #{msId}

update pt_measurement set ms_name = #{msName}, ms_desp = #{msDesp}, ms_created = #{msCreated}, ms_modified = #{msModified}, grp_id = #{grpId}, ms_created_admin = #{msCreatedAdmin} where ms_id = #{msId}
mapper.insert:
insert into pt_measurement (ms_name, ms_desp, ms_created, ms_modified, grp_id, ms_created_admin) values
(#{item.msName}, #{item.msDesp}, #{item.msCreated}, #{item.msModified}, #{item.grpId}, #{item.msCreatedAdmin})

insert into pt_measurement
ms_id,
ms_name, ms_desp, ms_created, ms_modified, grp_id, ms_created_admin,
values
#{msId},
#{msName}, #{msDesp}, #{msCreated}, #{msModified}, #{grpId}, #{msCreatedAdmin},
on duplicate key update
ms_id = #{msId},
ms_name = #{msName}, ms_desp = #{msDesp}, ms_created = #{msCreated}, ms_modified = #{msModified}, grp_id = #{grpId}, ms_created_admin = #{msCreatedAdmin},

insert into pt_measurement
ms_id,
ms_name,
ms_desp,
ms_created,
ms_modified,
grp_id,
ms_created_admin,
values
#{msId},
#{msName},
#{msDesp},
#{msCreated},
#{msModified},
#{grpId},
#{msCreatedAdmin},
on duplicate key update
ms_id = #{msId},
ms_name = #{msName},
ms_desp = #{msDesp},
ms_created = #{msCreated},
ms_modified = #{msModified},
grp_id = #{grpId},
ms_created_admin = #{msCreatedAdmin},
mapper.select: # 测验中学生基本信息 WITH stus AS (SELECT stu_id, stu_gender, YEAR(cms_created) - pc.cls_entry_year + pc.cls_entry_grade AS grade FROM pt_class_measurement LEFT JOIN pt_class pc on pt_class_measurement.cls_code = pc.cls_code LEFT JOIN pt_student ps on pc.cls_code = ps.cls_code WHERE ms_id = #{msId}), # 测验科目信息 subs AS (SELECT sub_id from pt_subject_subgroup left join pt_measurement on pt_measurement.grp_id = pt_subject_subgroup.grp_id LEFT JOIN pt_subgroup ps on pt_subject_subgroup.grp_id = ps.grp_id WHERE pt_measurement.ms_id = #{msId}), # 各科目评分标准，无评分标准则认为无需测试 pss AS ( SELECT DISTINCT gender, grade, subject_id FROM pt_score_sheet), # 测验中学生需要测验的科目 stusubs AS ( SELECT stu_id, sub_id FROM subs JOIN stus INNER JOIN pss ON pss.grade = stus.grade AND stu_gender = pss.gender AND subs.sub_id = pss.subject_id) select count(t1.stu_id) from (select stu_id, count(sub_id) as cnt from stusubs where exists(select stu_id from pt_score where stusubs.stu_id = pt_score.stu_id and pt_score.sub_id = stusubs.sub_id AND pt_score.ms_id = #{msId}) group by stu_id) t1 INNER JOIN (select stu_id, count(sub_id) as cnt from stusubs group by stu_id) t2 ON t1.stu_id = t2.stu_id AND t1.cnt >= t2.cnt;
